document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#90688c">beggar </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#90688c">lad </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff346c">dies </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4064ff">early </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
